paper_abstract: Our study investigated the effect of team knowledge on new product development (NPD). By investigating 207 NPD projects, we found that the declarative and procedural knowledge of the team and their use of IT had a positive influence on the team's knowledge base; and that the higher the functional diversity of the project team, the greater their overall knowledge. We also found that team knowledge positively impacted new product creativity and success in the market place. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: New product development team intelligence: Antecedents and consequences
